overview:
Niqotin is an Enterprise Application Service provider based out of Chennai, India. We are developing an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) application, named Rural ERP, for Indian Rural MSME’s.

The Rural ERP app manages all the necessary business functions like Customer Relationship Management, Product Lifecycle Management, Human Resource Management, Supply Chain Management, Point-of-Sale, Quality Management System, Financial Management and Business Intelligence. Apart from the core functionalities we propose some add-on apps like Payment services, Export-Import management, SMS services, Infrastructure management, Cloud Data services, Rural Store and other facilities for the benefit of Rural MSME’s.

Rural ERP is a tool of “Local Features with Global Future and Global Features with Local Future”.

The Rural ERP is the world’s First Indian Language ERP available in 9 Indian languages such as Bengali, Gujarati, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Punjabi, Tamil and Telugu apart from English.
